channel.title: Troube Launching Server [718] [Could not find or load main class]
channel.description:
this may be a simple fix but i'm very new to all 718 coding. The source i downloaded gives me an error when i try to launch the server: [code]Error: Could not find or load main class com.rs.utils.Sql.java[/code]
I tried to edit the Run.bat to see if there was any problem and it seems perfectly fine: [code]@echo off title hs "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.7.0_65/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.utils.Sql.java true true false pause[/code]
So i checked to see if the [i]Sql.java[/i] is actually missing, but its there. And in the exact directory is searching for it.
Any help guys? :| Thanks!
-------------------------------------------------- This is the imports and package of the [i]Sql.java[/i] file: [code]package com.rs.utils;
import java.sql.*;
import com.rs.game.player.Player;[/code]

item.title: Troube Launching Server [718] [Could not find or load main class]
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

Did you even read the error? It literally tells you whats wrong.

Error: [u][b]Could not find or load[/b][/u] main class com.rs.utils.Sql.java

Read full topic
item.source: Troube Launching Server [718] [Could not find or load main class]

item.title: Troube Launching Server [718] [Could not find or load main class]
item.dc:creator: @adamgulka adamgulka
item.description:
@adamgulka wrote:

Here is my run for my 718, not sure if it will work… but, worth a try?

@title Rune-Evo Server @echo off java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xms512m -Xmx512m -server -cp bin;lib/log4j-1.2.16.jar;lib/mysql-connector-java-5.1.18-bin.jar;lib/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;lib/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher pause

Or else try this:

@echo off title hs "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.7.0_65/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause

Read full topic

@Korres wrote:

this may be a simple fix but i’m very new to all 718 coding. The source i downloaded gives me an error when i try to launch the server:

I tried to edit the Run.bat to see if there was any problem and it seems perfectly fine:

@echo off title hs "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.7.0_65/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.utils.Sql.java true true false pause

So i checked to see if the Sql.java is actually missing, but its there. And in the exact directory is searching for it.

Any help guys?
Thanks!

This is the imports and package of the Sql.java file:

[code]package com.rs.utils;

import java.sql.*;
